price: ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߌߟߋ ߦߴߌ ߞߐߘߏ߲߬ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߞߟߋ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߞߎߛߍ߫ ߸ ߞߏ߬ߣߌ߲߬ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߓߍߣߊ߫ ߣߵߊ߬ ߟߐ߲߫
arabic: فَٱصۡفَحۡ عَنۡهُمۡ وَقُلۡ سَلَٰمٞۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'faḥ ʿanhum waqul salāmun fasawfa yaʿlamūna
